SELECT oslLocationID,
oslAccountNo,
oslShipTo,
oslLocationName,
oslAddress1,
oslAddress2,
oslCity,
oslState,
oslZip,
oslCountry,
oslCounty,
oslPrimaryPhone,
oslPrimaryFax,
oslPrimaryEmail,
oslLatitude,
oslLongitude,
oslLocationStatus,
oslLocationStatusNotes,
oslLegacyLocationID,
oslWhseShipTo,
oslProspectID,
oslOwnerType,
oslLta,
oslDMA,
oslMSA,
oslCountyFips,
oslMarketZone,
oslOpAreaZone,
oslCurrency,
oslLanguage,
oslTimeZone,
oslGeographicZone,
oslStatus,
oslStatusNotes,
oslLocationType,
oslSoftOpenDate,
oslGrandOpenDate,
oslClosed,
oslClosedDate,
oslClosedAuthorization,
oslRelocated,
oslRelocationCloseDate,

oslRelocationNotes,
oslAcquisition,
oslAcquisitionDate,
oslAcquisitionNotes,

oslTUAID,
oslTUADate,
oslTUAExpireDate,
oslTUATerm,
oslTUADateComplete,
oslTurnoverDate,
oslRecordChangesFlag,
oslOperationsIntroDate,
oslMsPipelineDate,
oslLicenseeID,
usra,
dtea,
usrc,
dtec,
oslAddress3,
oslStoreRefresh,

oslStoreRefreshNotes,

oslmPRMeeting,
oslmPlansSentToOwnerLic,
oslURLRegistration,

SELECT osOneSourceID,
osOneSourceName,
osLegacyLocationID,
osLegacyStoreID,
osProfitCenter,
osChannel,
osActive,
osStoreType,
osSource,
osLocationID,
osStartDate,
osEndDate,
usra,
dtea,
usrc,
dtec,
osProfitCenterType,
osProfitCenterStatus FROM [EDME_DataFactory].OSOneSource WITH(NOLOCK)

SELECT oslLicenseeID,
oslStoreType,
oslLicenseeNotes,
oslPrimaryCountry,
oslStatus,
oslActive,
oslActiveDate,
oslActiveNotes,
oslGuarantors,
oslMailingAddress1,
oslMailingAddress2,
oslMailingCity,
oslMailingState,
oslMailingZip,
oslMailingCountry,

oslLegalEntityAddress1,
oslLegalEntityAddress2,
oslLegalEntityCity,
oslLegalEntityState,
oslLegalEntityZip,
oslLegalEntityCountry,
usra,
dtea,
usrc,
detc,
oslLicensedTerritory,
oslDisclosureDocument,
oslMailingAdd FROM [EDME_DataFactory].OSLicensee WITH(NOLOCK)

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT * FROM (
SELECT B_CLASSNAME,
B_SOURCEID,
B_PUBID,
B_CREDATE,
OWNER_FIRST_NAME,
OWNER_LAST_NAME,
RAW_OWNER_PHONE,
RAW_CONTACT_EMAIL,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY B_SOURCEID, B_PUBID ORDER BY B_UPDDATE DESC) RowOneWins
    FROM SD_SITE_LEGAL_ENTITY_OWNER WITH (NOLOCK) 
) SL WHERE SL.RowOneWins = 1

SELECT * FROM (
SELECT SITE_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREDATE,
SITE_LEGAL_ENTITY_NAME,
RAW_SITE_ADDRESS_LINE1,
RAW_SITE_ADDRESS_LINE2,
RAW_SITE_CITY,
RAW_SITE_STATE_CODE,
RAW_SITE_POSTAL_CODE,
RAW_SITE_COUNTRY_CODE,
SITE_LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,
F_SITE_LEGAL_ENTITY,
FD_SITE_LEGAL_ENTITY,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY SITE_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID, B_PUBID ORDER BY B_UPDDATE DESC) RowOneWins
    FROM SD_SITE_LEGAL_ENTITY WITH (NOLOCK) 
) SL WHERE SL.RowOneWins = 1

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT * FROM (
SELECT 
B_CLASSNAME,
B_PUBID,
B_SOURCEID,
B_CREDATE,
SITE_NAME,
SITE_TYPE,
ISACTIVE,
SITE_DESCRIPTION,
SITE_OWNERSHIP_TYPE,
ADDRESS_STATUS_CODE,
ADDRESS_ERROR_CODE,
RAWADDRESS_LINE1,
RAWADDRESS_LINE2,
RAWCITY,
RAWSTATE_CODE,
RAWPOSTAL_CODE,
RAWCOUNTRY_CODE,
STASTREET_NAME,
STASTREET_NUMBER,
STACITY,
STASTATE_CODE,
STAPOSTAL_CODE,
STACOUNTRY_CODE,
STALATITUDE,
STALONGITUDE,
OPERATIONS_START_DATE,
OPERATIONS_END_DATE,
CUSTOMER_OPEN_DATE,
CUSTOMER_CLOSE_DATE,
LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE,
LOCAL_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_ARE,
TOTAL_SITE_AREA,
OPERATIONS_SITE_AREA,
CUSTOMER_SITE_AREA,
SITE_SHIP_TO,
RAW_MAIN_PHONE,
STD_MAIN_PHONE,
MAIN_PHONE_STATUS_CODE,
RAW_FAX,
STD_FAX,
FAX_STATUS_CODE,
RAW_CS_PHONE,
STD_CS_PHONE,
CS_PHONE_STATUS_CODE,
RAW_CS_EMAIL,
VLD_CS_EMAIL,
RAW_SALES_PHONE,
STD_SALES_PHONE,
SALES_PHONE_STATUS_CODE,
RAW_SALES_CHAT,
RAW_SERVICE_PHONE,
STD_SERVICE_PHONE,
SERVICE_PHONE_STATUS_CODE,
RAW_SERVICE_CHAT,
FP_WAREHOUSE_PARENT,
FS_WAREHOUSE_PARENT,
LICENSED_TERRITORY,
DISTRICT_MANAGER,
STORE_MODEL,
TUA_EXPIRATION_DATE,
F_SITE_LEGAL_ENTITY,
STORE_PROSPECT_ID,
NUMBER_OF_DOCK_DOORS,
PRIMARY_PROFIT_CENTER,
RETAIL_SYSTEMS_NUMBER,
GOOGLE_ID,
LEGACY_STORE_NUMBER,
LEGACY_ERP_DATABASE_NAME,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY B_SOURCEID, B_PUBID ORDER BY B_UPDDATE DESC) RowOneWins
    FROM SD_SITE_MAIN WITH (NOLOCK) 
) SL     WHERE SL.RowOneWins = 1

,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'Retail_SiteMaster'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT * FROM (
SELECT B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREDATE,
CONTENT_CATEGORY,
CONTENT_TYPE,
CONTENT_SHORT_TEXT,
CONTENT_LONG_TEXT,
CONTENT_LANGUAGE,
FP_SITE_MAIN,
FS_SITE_MAIN,
SITE_CONTENT_ID,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY SITE_CONTENT_ID ORDER BY B_UPDDATE DESC) RowOneWins
    FROM SA_SITE_CONTENT WITH (NOLOCK) 
) SL WHERE SL.RowOneWins = 1

SELECT * FROM (
SELECT B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREDATE,
SITE_HOURS_TYPE,
DAY_OF_WEEK,
START_TIME,
END_TIME,
FP_SITE_MAIN,
FS_SITE_MAIN,
SITE_DEFAULT_HOURS_ID,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY SITE_DEFAULT_HOURS_ID ORDER BY B_UPDDATE DESC) RowOneWins
    FROM SA_SITE_DEFAULT_HOURS WITH (NOLOCK) 
) SL WHERE SL.RowOneWins = 1

SELECT * FROM (
SELECT B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREDATE,
SITE_HOURS_TYPE,
CUSTOM_HOURS_REASON,
SITE_DATE,
START_TIME,
END_TIME,
FP_SITE_MAIN,
FS_SITE_MAIN,
SITE_CUSTOM_HOURS_ID,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY SITE_CUSTOM_HOURS_ID ORDER BY B_UPDDATE DESC) RowOneWins
    FROM SA_SITE_CUSTOM_HOURS WITH (NOLOCK) 
) SL WHERE SL.RowOneWins = 1

SELECT * FROM (
SELECT B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREDATE,
PROGRAM_NAME,
PROGRAM_START_DATE,
PROGRAM_END_DATE,
FP_SITE_MAIN,
FS_SITE_MAIN,
SITE_PROGRAM_ID,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY SITE_PROGRAM_ID ORDER BY B_UPDDATE DESC) RowOneWins
    FROM SA_SITE_PROGRAM WITH (NOLOCK) 
) SL WHERE SL.RowOneWins = 1

properties.description: This Dataflow loads RDC info to Semarchy staging
This Dataflow loads RDC info to Semarchy staging

source.sqlReaderQuery:
DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'Retail_SiteMaster'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'RetailSiteDataLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'RetailSiteDataLoad'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

SELECT
'SiteAdditionalInformation' AS B_CLASSNAME,
GETDATE() AS B_CREDATE,
GETDATE() AS B_UPDDATE,
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'INITIALLOAD' AS B_PUBID,
id AS SITE_ADDITIONAL_INFO_ID,
opr_monday_start_time AS OPR_MONDAY_START_TIME,
opr_monday_end_time AS OPR_MONDAY_END_TIME,
opr_tuesday_start_time AS OPR_TUESDAY_START_TIME,
opr_tuesday_end_time AS OPR_TUESDAY_END_TIME,
opr_wednesday_start_time AS OPR_WEDNESDAY_START_TIME,
opr_wednesday_end_time AS OPR_WEDNESDAY_END_TIME,
opr_thursday_start_time AS OPR_THURSDAY_START_TIME,
opr_thursday_end_time AS OPR_THURSDAY_END_TIME,
opr_friday_start_time AS OPR_FRIDAY_START_TIME,
opr_friday_end_time AS OPR_FRIDAY_END_TIME,
opr_saturday_start_time AS OPR_SATURDAY_START_TIME,
opr_saturday_end_time AS OPR_SATURDAY_END_TIME,
opr_sunday_start_time AS OPR_SUNDAY_START_TIME,
opr_sunday_end_time AS OPR_SUNDAY_END_TIME
FROM Retail.v_site_additional_info_incremental WITH(NOLOCK)

SELECT 
'Site' AS B_CLASSNAME,
GETDATE() AS B_CREDATE,
GETDATE() AS B_UPDDATE,
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'INITIALLOAD' AS B_PUBID,
site_id AS B_SOURCEID,
operational_status AS OPERATIONAL_STATUS,
type AS TYPE,
account_num AS ACCOUNT_NUMBER,
ship_to_num AS SHIP_TO_NUM,
model AS MODEL,
version AS VERSION,
time_zone AS TIME_ZONE,
local_currency_code  AS LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE,
raw_phone AS RAW_PHONE,
raw_cs_phone AS RAW_CS_PHONE,
raw_fax AS RAW_FAX,
sms_code AS SMS_CODE,
soft_open_date AS SOFT_OPEN_DATE,
grand_open_date AS GRAND_OPEN_DATE,
close_date AS CLOSE_DATE,
area_unit_of_measure AS AREA_UNIT_OF_MEASURE,
building_sqft AS BUILDING_SQFT,
warehouse_sqft AS WAREHOUSE_SQFT,
showroom_sqft AS SHOWROOM_SQFT,
office_sqft AS OFFICE_SQFT,
num_of_dock_doors AS NUM_OF_DOCK_DOORS,
retail_system_num AS RETAIL_SYSTEM_NUM, 
enterprise_store_num AS ENTERPRISE_STORE_NUM,
google_id AS F_GOOGLE_ID,
prospect_id  AS PROSPECT_ID,
CAST(dma_id AS DECIMAL(17,0)) AS DMA_ID, 
dma AS DMA,
msa_id AS MSA_ID,
msa AS MSA,
market AS MARKET,
region AS REGION,
domestic_category AS DOMESTIC_CATEGORY,
country_category AS COUNTRY_CATEGORY,
CASE WHEN warehouse_account_ship_to IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE 'INITIALLOAD' END as FP_SUPPORTING_WAREHOUSE,
warehouse_account_ship_to AS FS_SUPPORTING_WAREHOUSE
FROM Retail.v_site_incremental WITH(NOLOCK)

SELECT
'LegalEntity' AS B_CLASSNAME,
GETDATE() AS B_CREDATE,
GETDATE() AS B_UPDDATE,
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'INITIALLOAD' AS B_PUBID,
legal_entity_id AS LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
name AS NAME,
type AS TYPE,
lic_contact AS LIC_CONTACT,
lic_contact_email AS LIC_CONTACT_EMAIL,
raw_lic_contact_phone AS RAW_LIC_CONTACT_PHONE,
raw_addr_line1 AS RAW_ADDR_LINE1,
raw_addr_line2 AS RAW_ADDR_LINE2,
raw_city AS RAW_CITY,
raw_state AS RAW_STATE,
raw_state_code AS RAW_STATE_CODE,
raw_country AS RAW_COUNTRY,
raw_country_code AS RAW_COUNTRY_CODE,
raw_postal_code AS RAW_POSTAL_CODE,
raw_longitude AS RAW_LONGITUDE,
raw_latitude AS RAW_LATITUDE,
mailing_addr_line1 AS MAILING_ADDR_LINE1,
mailing_addr_line2 AS MAILING_ADDR_LINE2,
mailing_city AS MAILING_CITY,
mailing_state AS MAILING_STATE,
mailing_state_code AS MAILING_STATE_CODE,
mailing_country AS MAILING_COUNTRY,
mailing_country_code AS MAILING_COUNTRY_CODE,
mailing_postal_code AS MAILING_POSTAL_CODE,
os_legal_entity_id AS OS_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
company_code AS COMPANY_CODE
FROM Retail.v_legal_entity_incremental WITH(NOLOCK)

DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'Retail_SiteMaster'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'RetailSiteDataLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'RetailSiteDataLoad'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

SELECT 
'Site' AS B_CLASSNAME,
GETDATE() AS B_CREDATE,
GETDATE() AS B_UPDDATE,
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'INITIALLOAD' AS B_PUBID,
site_id AS B_SOURCEID,
operational_status AS OPERATIONAL_STATUS,
type AS TYPE,
account_num AS ACCOUNT_NUMBER,
ship_to_num AS SHIP_TO_NUM,
model AS MODEL,
version AS VERSION,
time_zone AS TIME_ZONE,
local_currency_code  AS LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE,
raw_phone AS RAW_PHONE,
raw_cs_phone AS RAW_CS_PHONE,
raw_fax AS RAW_FAX,
sms_code AS SMS_CODE,
soft_open_date AS SOFT_OPEN_DATE,
grand_open_date AS GRAND_OPEN_DATE,
close_date AS CLOSE_DATE,
area_unit_of_measure AS AREA_UNIT_OF_MEASURE,
building_sqft AS BUILDING_SQFT,
warehouse_sqft AS WAREHOUSE_SQFT,
showroom_sqft AS SHOWROOM_SQFT,
office_sqft AS OFFICE_SQFT,
num_of_dock_doors AS NUM_OF_DOCK_DOORS,
retail_system_num AS RETAIL_SYSTEM_NUM, 
enterprise_store_num AS ENTERPRISE_STORE_NUM,
prospect_id  AS PROSPECT_ID,
CAST(dma_id AS DECIMAL(17,0)) AS DMA_ID, 
dma AS DMA,
msa_id AS MSA_ID,
msa AS MSA,
market AS MARKET,
region AS REGION,
domestic_category AS DOMESTIC_CATEGORY,
country_category AS COUNTRY_CATEGORY,
CAST(ecom_fulfiller_flag AS BIT) AS ECOM_FULFILLER_FLAG
FROM Retail.v_site_warehouse_incremental WITH(NOLOCK)

SELECT
'LegalEntity' AS B_CLASSNAME,
GETDATE() AS B_CREDATE,
GETDATE() AS B_UPDDATE,
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'INITIALLOAD' AS B_PUBID,
legal_entity_id AS LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
name AS NAME,
type AS TYPE,
lic_contact AS LIC_CONTACT,
lic_contact_email AS LIC_CONTACT_EMAIL,
raw_lic_contact_phone AS RAW_LIC_CONTACT_PHONE,
raw_addr_line1 AS RAW_ADDR_LINE1,
raw_addr_line2 AS RAW_ADDR_LINE2,
raw_city AS RAW_CITY,
raw_state AS RAW_STATE,
raw_state_code AS RAW_STATE_CODE,
raw_country AS RAW_COUNTRY,
raw_country_code AS RAW_COUNTRY_CODE,
raw_postal_code AS RAW_POSTAL_CODE,
raw_longitude AS RAW_LONGITUDE,
raw_latitude AS RAW_LATITUDE,
mailing_addr_line1 AS MAILING_ADDR_LINE1,
mailing_addr_line2 AS MAILING_ADDR_LINE2,
mailing_city AS MAILING_CITY,
mailing_state AS MAILING_STATE,
mailing_state_code AS MAILING_STATE_CODE,
mailing_country AS MAILING_COUNTRY,
mailing_country_code AS MAILING_COUNTRY_CODE,
mailing_postal_code AS MAILING_POSTAL_CODE,
os_legal_entity_id AS OS_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
company_code AS COMPANY_CODE
FROM Retail.v_wh_legal_entity_incremental WITH(NOLOCK)

properties.description: Load RDC masterlist data from smartsheet to Semarchy staging
